Interface Menu

All Known Implementing Classes:
BankManagerMenu, CustomerMenu
public interface Menu
Menu interface defines different types of menus in the banking system. Each menu type (customer menu, bank manager menu) will implement this interface but provide its own specific implementation of how to: - Display menu options - Handle user choices - Get user input

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayMenu()
    Displays the menu options to the user.
    String
    getInput()
    Gets input from the user This method is customized by each menu type to handle specific input requirements.
    boolean
    handleChoice(String choice)
    Handles the user's menu choice and performs the corresponding action.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      void displayMenu()
      Displays the menu options to the user. Each implementing class will define its own specific menu layout and options.

    • handleChoice

      boolean handleChoice(String choice)
      Handles the user's menu choice and performs the corresponding action.
      Parameters:
      choice - the user's selected menu option
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the menu should continue showing (true) or exit (false)

    • getInput

      String getInput()
      Gets input from the user This method is customized by each menu type to handle specific input requirements.
      Returns:
      the user's input as a String
